name: dice hunt (jude13th)
description: hi welcome to dice hunt in this run and gun/platform game you the magical dice man can switch bodies for a limited amount of time which is based on a random number generator if you are wondering what the controls are they are a and d to move left and right s to switch bodies and space to jump you can also shoot by clicking some enemies have more health then others so make sure to keep shooting at one reach the dice tower at the end of each stage to progress or defeat the special bobs at the end to pass also
